itemInfo.itemDesc:
A sute tea full of nutritional value. 

- Unique Effect: Life EXP Increase +8% for 110 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Tea With Fine Scent
item.desc:
It’s made by steeping flowers or fruit in water. 

- Unique Effect: Max MP +50 for 60 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Tea With Fine Scent
item.desc:
It’s made by steeping flowers or fruit in water. 

- Unique Effect: Max MP +50 for 60 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min

item.name: Milk
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest. It can be Processed into other Cooking ingredients.\n\n- Usage: Cream, Cheese, Fruit Pudding, etc.

item.name: Salt
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking.It can be bought from a Food Vender or Innkeeper.

item.name: Butter
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be created by Shaking salt with the cream obtained from Shaking milk.\n\n- Usage: Cheese Pie, Seafood Grilled with Butter

item.name: Tea with Strong Scent
item.desc:
A rich-flavored tea brewed with the finest ingredients. 

- Unique Effect: MP +50 fro 75 min

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 30 min
